1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Amr bin 'Ata' said:"I saw Sa'ib bin Yazid sniffing his garment, and I said: 'Why (are you doing) that?' He said: 'I heard the Messenger of Allah say: "No ablution (is needed) unless there is an odor or a sound

chapter.ara-name: باب لاَ وُضُوءَ إِلاَّ مِنْ حَدَثٍ
